name: image_file
description: File name needs to be unique

name: image_type
description: Image type should be SEM, Visual, or Fluorescence

name: researcher_name
description: The first and last name of the researcher or the name of the lab

name: affiliation
description: The full name of the institute where the researcher is from
valid_example: Moore Institute for Plastic Pollution Research

name: citation
description: The researcher's last name and year, which study the image is from, and the full name of the institute where the researcher is from
valid_example: Lattin and Moore 2020, Interlab Comparison Study Data, Moore Institute for Plastic Pollution Research

name: instrument_name
description: The full name of the instrument
rule: instrument_name %in% c("Nikon SMZ1270", "NA", "MEIJI TECHNO EMZ-8TR with OptixCAM summit K2", "Olympus MVX-ZB10")

name: analysis_date
description: The year the image was analyzed

name: polymer_type_of_particle
description: The polymer type of the particle or should be an 'NA' if it is unknown

name: polymer_type_of_particle_original
description: The original source of the particle or should be an 'NA' if it is unknown

name: magnification
description: Magnification of the analysis must have an 'x' after the number

name: color
description: The color of the particle should be one word with the first letter capitalized, or 'Unknown' if it is not recorded

name: color_original
description: The original color before analysis should be one word with the first letter capitalized, or 'NA' if it is not recorded

name: morphology
description: The morphology of the particle should be one word with the first letter capitalized, or 'NA' if it is not recorded

name: morphology_original
description: The original morphology before analysis should be one word with the first letter capitalized, or 'NA' if it is not recorded

name: size_of_particle
description: The size of the particle should have a unit after the number and can be a range

name: size_dimension
description: The name of the size used to describe the plastic rather than the exact dimensions
